slideInfo.title: A Typical High School History Textbook

pButton.Name: A
pButton.popInfo: Notice the size and amount of text on this page.

pButton.Name: B
pButton.popInfo: Vocabulary words are often highlighted and in boldface type.

pButton.Name: C
pButton.popInfo: Notice the frequent use of headings and subheadings.

pButton.Name: D
pButton.popInfo: The high school book discusses Rousseau's contributions to the Enlightenment in three short paragraphs.
